tool_description: This Spanish Conjugation API will provide you over 9000+ Spanish verbs conjugations.
name: Spanish Conjugation
title: Spanish Conjugation

api_list.name: conjugate
api_list.description: This endpoint conjugates the Spanish verb.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://spanish-conjugation.p.rapidapi.com/conjugate/beber"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spanish-conjugation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://spanish-conjugation.p.rapidapi.com/conjugate/{word}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spanish-conjugation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
